meanings.definition: A North African village or settlement, typically fortified and built of mud-brick.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ksars stood proudly in the desert.
meanings.sent2: We visited several ksars during our trip to Morocco.
meanings.sent3: The ksars seemed to huddle together like shy turtles.
meanings.sent4: The ksars were like sturdy fortresses guarding the desert.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ksars against the golden sand was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'ksar', referring to multiple North African villages or settlements.
meanings.sent1: The ksars in the distance looked like a cluster of tiny homes.
meanings.sent2: Many travelers were amazed by the beauty of the ksars.
meanings.sent3: The ksars seemed to gossip with each other in the evening breeze.
meanings.sent4: The ksars dotted the landscape like scattered puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ksars under the setting sun was breathtaking.
